comment: Great rye whiskey with a subtle taste of maple sweetness. Great over ice or in a cocktail.
Very smooth. Maple is subtle. Sweet notes on the front and a smooth finish. No bite on the back end.
Very smooth for a Rye whiskey. Light bite, with a spiced finished.

Awesome. We are a group of 5 whiskey enthusiasts and we all thought it was easily one of the best barrel finishes that I have tried. Also made a serious Manhattan with it tonight as we tested this both straight up and in a cocktail. Winner all round for us.
Killer combination of maple sweetness and rye spice. Hands down one of my favorites!
Rye flavor comes thru and the maple finish is ever so slight.  I didn't detect maple flavor, but it was a smooth finish.  Well done.
Not sweet like you may expect
Sweet taste. Hints of maple. Lovely smell
